title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts to understand their needs and expectations.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and interactions between different modules. The architecture should be scalable, maintainable, and performant; it should also address security concerns, error handling, potential integration with existing systems or third-party services, and consider performance requirements. It is recommended to include a diagram visualizing the proposed system structure.

title: Data Model and Database Design
description: Design the data model and database schema to store and manage the documentation and mapping information. The data model should include entities for documents, sections, relationships, and any other relevant metadata. Consider the need for versioning and access control mechanisms. The database schema should be optimized for efficient querying and retrieval of mapping information, with a focus on scalability, reliability, and performance. The design should also take into account potential future expansions of the VisualDocMapper tool.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the VisualDocMapper tool, including layout, navigation, and visual representation of documentation maps. The design should consider usability, accessibility, responsiveness across different devices and screen sizes. Ensure that the design aligns with our current design system (if applicable) and is scalable for future updates. Include wireframes or mockups to illustrate the proposed design. If possible, provide interactive prototypes for better understanding.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend functionality, including the core logic for parsing documentation, extracting relationships, and generating visual maps.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface and integrate it with the backend functionality to display the visual documentation maps.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, write test cases, and perform thorough testing of the VisualDocMapper tool, including functional, integration, and user acceptance testing.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the VisualDocMapper tool.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure the necessary infrastructure, and automate the deployment process for the VisualDocMapper tool.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides to assist users in understanding and effectively utilizing the VisualDocMapper tool.
